original_body_lines: One of Britain's biggest windmills which boasts three bedrooms and two bathrooms is on the market for £650,000, a figure cheaper than the average house price in London.
The historic property known as the Maud Foster Windmill is over 200-years-old and dominates the skyline over the Lincolnshire market town of Boston.
Standing at over 80ft tall, the seven-story, five-sail windmill is one of the largest operational windmills in the country. (Daily Mail)
